short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doter is a browser extension wallet for Polkadot and Kusama. It aims to become an interactive bridge between Polkadot and Parachain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the launch of Polkadot Parachain, the browser extension wallet will play an important role in the interaction between Polkadot and parachain. However, the application market currently lacks an experience-friendly Polkadot browser extension wallet, so Doter came into being.
We are committed to building Doter into a truly user-centric Polkadot wallet, attracting users to participate in the Polkadot ecosystem by providing a clear and concise UI experience and rich on-chain governance functions.
